summary:
Concerns:

- Wants physical meetings in Bangalore.

- Case not assigned to Bangalore team.

- Committed field support during sale not provided.

- Wants case transferred to local Bangalore team.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed customer has two profiles.

- Executive will check commitment and call back.

- Executive explained company policy for physical meetings.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back by evening or Monday.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- field support, physical meeting, gst, profile, refund
